scripts.dev:build: npx nx run-many -t install && npx nx run-many -t docker-build
scripts.dev:start: npx nx run-many -t install && npx nx run-many -t docker-build && ./scripts/dev.sh
scripts.flutter:clean: cd app && flutter clean && rm -rf ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock ios/.symlinks ios/Runner.xcworkspace build
scripts.flutter:install: cd app && flutter pub get && cd ios && pod install --repo-update
